name: Parallel (itch) (BeXCool)
description:
A 3D puzzle game. This game was made over the course of 10 days using Unreal Engine 4, Blender and Fl Studio. We'll continue to programme this game after the game jam! :)

What is this game about?

You play as a guy who needs to get home. But you discover something along the way.

Hint

Sometime you need to restart level (In pause menu) if you haven't found right way and go to the other...

Controls

W, A, S, D - Move
Q - Change dimension backward
E - Change dimension forward
Left Mouse Button Click - Interact with levers, flowers and crystals
Escape (ESC) - Open pause menu

Autors

Petr Pavlík - Programming

Radovan Šťastný - 3D models, animations, level design
https://www.artstation.com/radovanstastny

Vojta Bernátek - Music
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCtn04IV3PzKvjVkAv9Csmy

Testers

Matěj Bartusek - Helped us a lot with testing
